Two-level mixed nesting

  • Unordered item 1

    1. Nested ordered A

    2. Nested ordered B

  • Unordered item 2

Three-level mixed nesting

  • Level 1 A

    1. Level 2 A

      • Level 3 A

      • Level 3 B

    2. Level 2 B

  • Level 1 B

Five-level mixed nesting

  • UL depth 1 item A

    1. OL depth 2 item A

      • UL depth 3 item A

        1. OL depth 4 item A

          • UL depth 5 item A

          • UL depth 5 item B

        2. OL depth 4 item B

      • UL depth 3 item B

    2. OL depth 2 item B

  • UL depth 1 item B
